doctor_utters: [ask] How may I help you today?
[ask] Do you have sore throat, runny nose, or nasal congestion?
[ask] Do you have difficulty breathing or wheezing?
[ask] Have you been exposed to any animals or birds recently?
[ask] Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
[ask] Do you have a history of asthma or allergies?
[ask] Have you been exposed to any environmental irritants such as smoke or dust?
[ask] Have you been coughing up any sputum or mucus?
[inform] Based on your description, the most likely diagnosis is Bronchitis.
patient_utters: Yes, I have been coughing up blood.
